markdownRemark.html:
We use host our lab website on Github at github.com/biodatlab/biodatlab.github.io. The website runs on GatsbyJS template. To add your profile, you can simply fork and clone the repository. Then you can add yourself by adding a markdown file to _data/people/<your_profile.md> and adding your profile image to static/assets/people/<your_photo.png>. That's it!

After adding your profile page and image, you can make the pull request back to the repository. We use Github actions to build the page and put it into gh-pages branch. Then, it will be accessible on biodatlab.github.io.
